name: A Firefighter's Boxing Matches
description:
Firefighting is a dangerous occupation. One wrong move and everything is over. But you're in luck: Coach L. F. Ant will personally teach you the way of the firefighter!

This game was made with PuzzleScript for the first Thinky Puzzle Jam.

Controls:

  • arrow keys / WASD to move
  • Z to undo
  • R to restart
  • escape to return to the menu / level select screen
